events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your website, but it does not fit me correctly. I would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The customer's request has been categorized under the Refund cluster for processing their refund request.
Support agent Maria has been assigned to handle the refund case raised by the customer.
Hello! I'm Maria from customer support. I understand that you'd like to request a refund for your jacket purchase.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the item is unused and in original packaging for refund processing?
My order number is 789456123, and the jacket is still unused with all tags attached in its original packaging.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate your refund process within 3-5 business days once we receive the returned jacket.
That sounds good, thanks for the prompt assistance. I'll send the jacket back today.
We have received the returned jacket and processed your refund. You should see the amount credited within 5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm if you have received the refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Yes, I received the refund today. Thank you for resolving this so efficiently!
Closing this case as the refund has been received and the customer has no further issues.
A feedback survey has been sent to the customer to rate their experience with the refund process.
